comment: Professor Terrell is an ultra-talented individual and an outstanding professor. He makes you feel like you're getting your money's worth from college with his professional advice. He's also willing to help you develop. If you take Digital Media Production, Professor Terrell allows you to explore content that other professors wouldn't.

Professor Terrell is a good teacher, but a really tough grader. His demeanor is very straight to the point and blunt. His critique does help you if you want to actually become a better writer. There are a lot of hands-on projects like videos and podcasts. I would take him again, but probably in person next time.

Professor Terrel is an amazing instructor at KSU. He keeps the class engaging, exciting and he allows students to have endless creative freedom when working on assignments. This course does have a lot of group projects but with his structure, they are very fun to work on. I recommend anyone who enjoys working with Adobe software to take his class!

Take this class or any class you can that's taught by Professor Terrell! He is the best professor that I've had. He really knows what he is teaching, and he creates a great, comfortable atmosphere for his students to learn.

A lot of this class is common sense to most people, but Prof. Terrell managed to make it interesting and engaging. The class is very discussion heavy, and participating will really help keep it interesting.

This class was very easy and engaging. I have nothing against Professor Terrell, but the material is politically biased in some areas which was annoying but I expected that. He's very helpful and funny. Lots of group discussion and activities. He does expect attendance.

Professor Terrell was an amazing instructor. He not only cared to teach my class about communications, but he also helped encourage all-around good human behavior. His class was composed of weekly quizzes and two exams. If your degree requires this course, or if you need a free elective, I highly suggest taking this course with Professor Terrell.

Pretty straightforward...Good teacher requiring weekly chapter quizzes, midterm, and final. His lectures were enjoyable and encouraged participation thru discussions on certain topics and past experiences. It was his first time teaching this course so he was a little unorganized but willing to work with students. He responded to emails immediately.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Amazing lectures --Graded by few things

comment: Be prepared to do lots of group work in this course. Professor Terrell believes that group work is an essential part of any job and we need to get used to it now. He will answer any questions regarding assignments and cares about his students. A $90 personality quiz is required for this course which I found ridiculously expensive and useless.
rating_tags: Group projects--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: your entire grade is based off the group projects. He grades everything on a 5 point scale.  This means that there is no nuance in the grades and leads to a situation where you can lose a lot points easily.  He is very picky and demanding when it comes to grades more harshly then other professors in a more specialized class. doesn't respect time
rating_tags: Tough grader--Group projects--Beware of pop quizzes

comment: He is the best professor I have had so far (sophomore). His lectures are engaging and fun. Everything that is taught is straight forward, no complications. Matthew Terrell's class is easy as well, and he makes sure everyone gets the chance to ask questions and engage. Take him
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Easy A. Very knowledgeable about course content, but sometimes goes down rabbit trails and talks about off topic things. Would definitely take this class for an easy A without too much effort.

This is one of the best professors, he goes over power points and give examples of real life scenarios throughout class, you get quizzes once a week but it's so easy. You play improv games and there's so many activities throughout the year, that make it amazing. TAKE IT IF YOU WANT TO HAVE FUN, BEST CLASS ON CAMPUS.
